1463.quoteText: Uber may immediately terminate these Terms or any Services with respect to you, or generally cease offering or deny access to the Services or any portion thereof, at any time for any reason.
1463.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

1580.title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies

tosdr.case: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
tosdr.tldr: Uber offers a wide variety of additional policies to show their position in certain social and political fields.
